sentence.Network_en: My products mainly include vanadium pentoxide, Ferrovanadium, vanadate and coatings.
sentence.Network_cn: 我公司经销的产品主要有五氧化二钒、钒铁合金钒酸盐和涂料.

sentence.Network_en: The novel non - toxic bismuth vanadate pigment can be the effective substitute for yellow toxic inorganic pigments.
sentence.Network_cn: 新型无毒的钒酸铋颜料可作为毒性无机黄颜料的一种良好替代品.

sentence.Network_en: This article has reviewed the properties, uses and preparation approaches of vanadate pigment.
sentence.Network_cn: 综述了钒酸铋颜料的性能 、 用途及其制备方法.
